TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IServiceBehavior
public ref class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IServiceBehavior
type AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute = class inherit Attribute interface IServiceBehavior

summary.span: 应用于 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务，指示该服务是否可以在 ASP.NET 兼容代码中运行。

span.span: Applied to a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service to indicate whether that service can be run in ASP.NET compatibility code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用于服务实现类时，此属性可指示该服务是否需要 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容模式，或是否支持为宿主应用程序域 (AppDomain) 启用该兼容模式。When applied to a service implementation class, this attribute indicates whether this service requires or supports [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode to be enabled for the hosting application domain (AppDomain). 承载 WCF 服务的 Appdomain 可以在两种不同的托管模式下运行：AppDomains hosting WCF services can run in two different hosting modes: - 混合传输模式 (默认) ：在此模式下，WCF 服务不参与 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP 管道。Mixed Transports Mode (Default): In this mode, WCF services do not participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline. 这可以确保 WCF 服务的行为一致，与宿主环境和传输无关。This guarantees that a WCF service behaves consistently, independent of hosting environment and transport. - [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容模式：在此模式下，WCF 服务以 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 类似于 .asmx 服务的方式参与 HTTP 管道。Compatibility Mode: In this mode, WCF services participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline in a manner similar to ASMX services. [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 文件授权、Url 授权和 HTTP 会话状态等功能适用于在此模式下运行的 WCF 服务。features such as File Authorization, UrlAuthorization, and HTTP Session State are applicable to WCF services running in this mode. 宿主模式由应用程序级配置标记 `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled` 控制。The hosting mode is controlled by the application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. `` `` `` `false`默认情况下，此标志为默认值，因此 WCF 服务在混合传输模式下运行，除非您显式选择了 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容模式。This flag is `false` by default and thus WCF services run in the Mixed Transports Mode unless you explicitly opt into the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode. 有关 ASP.NET 兼容模式的详细信息，请参阅[ < serviceHostingEnvironment > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment)。For more information about ASP.NET compatibility mode, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment). 使用 属性可以实现此目的。Use the property to do this. 运行时，应用程序可以通过检查静态属性 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 的值，来检测是否启用了 兼容模式。At runtime, applications can detect if [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples 服务开发人员可以通过将上的属性设置为，确保其服务仅在 ASP.NET 兼容模式下运行， 如以下示例中所示Service developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the property on the to as shown in the following example [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置该服务所需的 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility required by the service.

value.span: 指示该服务所需的 兼容程度的 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]。

span.span: The that indicates the services required degree of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以在代码中设置宿主模式。Use the property to set the hosting mode in code. 还可以通过设置应用程序级配置标记 `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled` 来完成此操作。This can also be done by setting an application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ < serviceHostingEnvironment > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment)。For more information, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment). 运行时，应用程序可以通过检查静态属性 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 的值，来检测是否启用了 兼容模式。At runtime, applications can detect whether [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

exception.span: 该值不是 的有效值。

span.span: The value is not a valid one for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持 WCF 基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。This method supports the WCF infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

summary.span: 检查主机类型与 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容性要求是否一致。

span.span: Checks that the type of hosting is consistent with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持 WCF 基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。This method supports the WCF infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

span.span: The service hosting is not compatible with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.
